Languages.string: understands Elvish and Umbral but can't speak

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: A shadhavar's innate spellcasting ability score is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can cast the following spells, requiring no components: At will: disguise self (as horse or unicorn only) 2/day: darkness (centered on itself, moves with the shadhavar)

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: A shadhavar's gore attacks are magical.

MonsterTrait.Name: Plaintive Melody (3/day)
MonsterTrait.Text: As a bonus action, a shadhavar can play a captivating melody through its hollow horn. Creatures within 60 feet that can hear the shadhavar must make a successful DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the start of the shadhavar's next turn. A creature charmed in this way is incapacitated, its speed is reduced to 0, and a shadhavar has advantage on attack rolls against it.

MonsterTrait.Name: Shadesight
MonsterTrait.Text: A shadhavar's darkvision functions in magical darkness.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: A shadhavar makes one gore attack and one hooves attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Gore
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Hooves
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
